meanings.definition: A power saw with a long, sharp blade consisting of a continuous band of toothed metal stretched between two or more wheels.
meanings.sent1: The bandsaws at the workshop are used to cut through thick pieces of wood.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter used a bandsaw to carefully slice through the wooden plank.
meanings.sent3: When the bandsaws started playing music, everyone was surprised by the melodious sound.
meanings.sent4: The bandsaws of the forest cut through the silence with their buzzing hum.
meanings.sent5: The shiny bandsaws gleamed in the sunlight, ready for their next task.

meanings.definition: To cut or shape with a bandsaw.
meanings.sent1: He bandsaws the logs into smaller pieces for the fireplace.
meanings.sent2: She bandsaws the metal sheets with precision and skill.
meanings.sent3: The chef bandsaws the vegetables into perfect slices for the stir-fry.
meanings.sent4: The sculptor bandsaws the marble block, revealing a beautiful statue within.
meanings.sent5: The tailor bandsaws the fabric swiftly, creating a masterpiece garment.
